1562.verse: وَيَـٰقَوْمِ|And O my people!|137|145|8445$لَا يَجْرِمَنَّكُمْ|(Let) not cause you to sin|195|211|8691$شِقَاقِىٓ|my dissension|111|127|8692$أَن|lest|44|60|655$يُصِيبَكُم|befalls you|98|114|8693$مِّثْلُ|similar|60|68|1999$مَآ|(to) what|84|102|262$أَصَابَ|befell|84|119|8694$قَوْمَ نُوحٍ|(the) people of Nuh|150|185|8695$أَوْ|or|41|76|154$قَوْمَ هُودٍ|(the) people of Hud|150|185|8696$أَوْ|or|41|58|154$قَوْمَ صَـٰلِحٍ‌ۚ|people of Salih.|122|142|8697$وَمَا|And not|72|113|46$قَوْمُ لُوطٍ|(are the) people of Lut|172|213|8698$مِّنكُم|from you|78|119|643$بِبَعِيدٍ|far off.|68|88|8669$

1563.verse: وَٱسْتَغْفِرُواْ|And ask forgiveness|152|165|1775$رَبَّكُمْ|(of) your Lord,|117|142|6461$ثُمَّ|then|50|75|293$تُوبُوٓاْ|turn in repentance|143|168|8361$إِلَيْهِ‌ۚ|to Him.|67|92|296$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|83|58$رَبِّى|my Lord|72|160|2902$رَحِيمٌ|(is) Most Merciful,|140|317|1294$وَدُودٌ|Most Loving."|109|198|8699$

1564.verse: قَالُواْ|They said,|89|102|101$يَـٰشُعَيْبُ|"O Shuaib!|96|122|6599$مَا|Not|43|70|262$نَفْقَهُ|we understand|118|144|8700$كَثِيرًا|much|72|98|275$مِّمَّا|of what|71|98|216$تَقُولُ|you say,|77|90|3239$وَإِنَّا|and indeed, we|121|130|682$لَنَرَٮٰكَ|surely [we] see you|152|169|6488$فِينَا|among us|83|100|8576$ضَعِيفًا‌ۖ|weak.|83|100|2525$وَلَوْلَا|And if not|85|102|2238$رَهْطُكَ|for your family|115|124|8701$لَرَجَمْنَـٰكَ‌ۖ|surely we would have stoned you,|247|269|8702$وَمَآ أَنتَ|and you are not|126|170|8703$عَلَيْنَا|against us|88|132|681$بِعَزِيزٍ|mighty."|81|103|8704$

1565.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|88|309$يَـٰقَوْمِ|"O my people!|112|142|513$أَرَهْطِىٓ|Is my family|99|129|8705$أَعَزُّ|mightier|72|102|8706$عَلَيْكُم|on you|79|109|416$مِّنَ|than|50|80|156$ٱللَّهِ|Allah?|58|73|606$وَٱتَّخَذْتُمُوهُ|And you have taken Him,|186|201|8707$وَرَآءَكُمْ|behind your|97|126|8708$ظِهْرِيًّا‌ۖ|backs.|83|112|8709$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|99|58$رَبِّى|my Lord|72|101|2902$بِمَا|of what|71|86|43$تَعْمَلُونَ|you do|92|300|725$مُحِيطٌ|(is) All-Encompassing.|166|374|168$

1566.verse: وَيَـٰقَوْمِ|And O my people!|137|147|8445$ٱعْمَلُواْ|Work|85|105|6063$عَلَىٰ|(according) to|115|135|52$مَكَانَتِكُمْ|your position,|110|130|6064$إِنِّى|indeed, I am|102|122|312$عَـٰمِلٌ‌ۖ|working.|75|85|6065$سَوْفَ|Soon|76|84|4083$تَعْلَمُونَ|you will know|108|125|212$مَن|(on) whom|91|108|76$يَأْتِيهِ|will come|80|97|8481$عَذَابٌ|a punishment|108|125|72$يُخْزِيهِ|(that will) disgrace him,|177|186|8482$وَمَنْ|and who|76|83|1012$هُوَ|[he]|48|63|298$كَـٰذِبٌ‌ۖ|(is) a liar.|84|99|8710$وَٱرْتَقِبُوٓاْ|And watch,|102|117|8711$إِنِّى|indeed, I am|102|117|312$مَعَكُمْ|with you|77|92|121$رَقِيبٌ|a watcher."|97|104|8712$

1567.verse: وَلَمَّا|And when|85|94|852$جَآءَ|came|57|75|4023$أَمْرُنَا|Our Command,|116|134|8101$نَجَّيْنَا|We saved|85|103|8559$شُعَيْبًا|Shuaib|73|91|6585$وَٱلَّذِينَ|and those who|118|136|42$ءَامَنُواْ|believed|82|91|84$مَعَهُۥ|with him|75|97|1875$بِرَحْمَةٍ|by a Mercy|94|138|6432$مِّنَّا|from Us.|75|119|1169$وَأَخَذَتِ|And seized|92|136|8713$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|133|20$ظَلَمُواْ|wronged,|81|103|558$ٱلصَّيْحَةُ|the thunderous blast|158|174|8594$فَأَصْبَحُواْ|then they became|141|173|5056$فِى|in|48|80|89$دِيَـٰرِهِمْ|their homes|97|129|800$جَـٰثِمِينَ|fallen prone.|102|118|6563$

1570.verse: إِلَىٰ|To|53|60|118$فِرْعَوْنَ|Firaun|93|106|2649$وَمَلَإِيْهِۦ|and his chiefs,|116|129|6651$فَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ|but they followed|136|149|8718$أَمْرَ فِرْعَوْنَ‌ۖ|(the) command of Firaun,|189|202|8719$وَمَآ|and not|71|78|46$أَمْرُ فِرْعَوْنَ|(the) command of Firaun|184|386|8720$بِرَشِيدٍ|was right.|86|288|8721$

1562.verse: And O my people, let not [your] dissension from me cause you to be struck by that similar to what struck the people of Noah or the people of Hud or the people of Salih. And the people of Lot are not from you far away.

1563.verse: And ask forgiveness of your Lord and then repent to Him. Indeed, my Lord is Merciful and Affectionate."

1564.verse: They said, "O Shu'ayb, we do not understand much of what you say, and indeed, we consider you among us as weak. And if not for your family, we would have stoned you [to death]; and you are not to us one respected."

1565.verse: He said, "O my people, is my family more respected for power by you than Allah? But you put Him behind your backs [in neglect]. Indeed, my Lord is encompassing of what you do.

1566.verse: And O my people, work according to your position; indeed, I am working. You are going to know to whom will come a punishment that will disgrace him and who is a liar. So watch; indeed, I am with you a watcher, [awaiting the outcome]."

1567.verse: And when Our command came, We saved Shu'ayb and those who believed with him, by mercy from Us. And the shriek seized those who had wronged, and they became within their homes [corpses] fallen prone

1568.verse: As if they had never prospered therein. Then, away with Madyan as Thamud was taken away.

1569.verse: And We did certainly send Moses with Our signs and a clear authority

1570.verse: To Pharaoh and his establishment, but they followed the command of Pharaoh, and the command of Pharaoh was not [at all] discerning.
